Commentary.ab: VrS2.12a maińiiaōiiā̊. stōiš.] lectio dificilior, Iranian mss. maińiiaiiā̊, but cf. VrS17.11 maińiiaōiiā̊ 2000, 2010. lectio continua in 2610, 2620, 2640 and 2220, with saṃdhi °-aōstōiš (vs. **-ā̊stōiš). Vid. Kellens, 2006, 42.
